item.title: job032
item.description: Job alias: None Plotly.d3.json("/jobs/job032/import_Import_job032_Import_job032_.json", function(err, fig) { Plotly.plot('\/jobs\/job032\/import_Import_job032_Import_job032_.json', fig.data, fig.layout, {responsive: true}); }); Job command(s): Executing new job on Sun Oct 10 15:05:02 2021 with the following command(s): relion_import –do_micrographs –optics_group_name “opticsGroup1” –optics_group_mtf mtf_k2_200kV.star –angpix 0.885 –kV 200 –Cs 1.4 –Q0 0.1 –beamtilt_x 0 –beamtilt_y 0 –i “MotionCorr/job002/Movies/*.mrc” –odir Import/job032/ –ofile micrographs.star –pipeline_control Import/job032/

item.title: job001
